Yaml header for Chinese pdf output

---  
title: "Your Report Title"  
author: "YourName"  
date: "2022-10-31"  
documentclass: ctexart  
output:  
  rticles::ctex:  
    fig_caption: yes  
    number_sections: yes  
    toc: yes  
editor_options:  
  chunk_output_type: console  
---
